name: live-nuts
description: Live HTML template engine using NUTS syntax

scripts.test: npm run build-tests && cat dist/tests.js | testling
scripts.build: npm run build-src && npm run build-tests
scripts.build-src: mkdir -p dist && browserify -t babelify src/nuts.js -o dist/nuts.js

author: Jacobo Tabernero - jacobo@xarope.eu
